==============
File Structure
==============

An explanation of the file structure of the controls repository.

.. list-table:: File Structure of ``controls/src``
   :widths: 25 25 50
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Folder
     - File Name
     - Description
   * - nodes
     - controller.hpp
     - Description of `file1`
   * -
     - controller.cpp
     - Description of `file2`
   * - mppi
     - mppi.hpp
     - Description of `file3`
   * -
     - mppi.cuh
     - Description of `file4`
   * -
     - mppi.cu
     - Description of `file6`
   * -
     - functors.cuh
     - Description of `file7`
   * -
     - types.cuh
     - Description of `file8`
   * - state
     - state_estimator.hpp
     - Description of `file9`
   * -
     - state_estimator.cuh
     - Description of `file10`
   * -
     - state_estimator.cu
     - Description of `file11`

.. list-table:: File Structure of controls/
   :widths: 25 75
   :header-rows: 1

   * - File Name
     - Description
   * - `file1`
     - Description of `file1`
   * - `file2`
     - Description of `file2`
   * - `file3`
     - Description of `file3`
   * - `file4`
     - Description of `file4`
